          Intelligently rephrase text with different styles and tones.


          This endpoint provides intelligent text rephrasing that leverages your
          knowledge graph

          to suggest contextually appropriate alternatives in different styles
          and tones.


          ## Key Features


          | Feature | Description | Benefit |

          |---------|-------------|---------|

          | **AI-Powered Rephrasing** | Uses OpenRouter LLMs for intelligent
          text transformation | High-quality alternatives |

          | **Knowledge Integration** | Leverages graph database for contextual
          alternatives | Relevant suggestions |

          | **Style Control** | Multiple writing styles (academic, casual,
          technical, formal, creative) | Flexible output |

          | **Context-Aware** | Maintains meaning while adapting tone and
          structure | Semantic preservation |


          ## Writing Styles


          | Style | Description | Use Case |

          |-------|-------------|----------|

          | `academic` | Formal, scholarly tone | Research papers, academic
          writing |

          | `casual` | Informal, conversational tone | Blog posts, social media
          |

          | `technical` | Precise, technical language | Documentation,
          specifications |

          | `formal` | Professional, business tone | Reports, proposals |

          | `creative` | Engaging, imaginative tone | Marketing, storytelling |


          ## Request Examples


          **Basic Request:**

          ```json

          {
            "text": "The future of AI is very promising.",
            "style": "technical"
          }

          ```


          **Advanced Request:**

          ```json

          {
            "text": "Machine learning algorithms are becoming more sophisticated.",
            "style": "academic",
            "k": 5,
            "document_ids": ["ml_research_2024"],
            "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"]
          }

          ```


          ## Response Format


          **Example Response:**

          ```json

          {
            "original_text": "The future of AI is very promising.",
            "rephrasings": [
              {
                "text": "Artificial intelligence technologies demonstrate significant potential for advancement.",
                "confidence": 0.89,
                "style_match": 0.92
              },
              {
                "text": "AI development trajectories indicate substantial opportunities ahead.",
                "confidence": 0.85,
                "style_match": 0.88
              }
            ],
            "style": "technical",
            "sources": [
              {
                "id": "ai_development_potential_a1b2c3",
                "title": "AI Development Potential",
                "type": "Frame"
              }
            ],
            "search_time_ms": 140,
            "generation_time_ms": 2100
          }

          ```


          ## Transformation Process


          | Step | Description | Purpose |

          |------|-------------|---------|

          | **Context Analysis** | Understand original text meaning and context
          | Semantic understanding |

          | **Knowledge Integration** | Find related concepts in knowledge graph
          | Contextual enhancement |

          | **Style Application** | Apply requested style transformation | Tone
          adaptation |

          | **Multiple Options** | Generate several rephrasing alternatives |
          Choice variety |

Intelligently rephrase text with different styles and tones.

This endpoint provides intelligent text rephrasing that leverages your knowledge graph
to suggest contextually appropriate alternatives in different styles and tones.

## Key Features

| Feature | Description | Benefit |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| **AI-Powered Rephrasing** | Uses OpenRouter LLMs for intelligent text transformation | High-quality alternatives |
| **Knowledge Integration** | Leverages graph database for contextual alternatives | Relevant suggestions |
| **Style Control** | Multiple writing styles (academic, casual, technical, formal, creative) | Flexible output |
| **Context-Aware** | Maintains meaning while adapting tone and structure | Semantic preservation |

## Writing Styles

| Style | Description | Use Case |
|-------|-------------|----------|
| `academic` | Formal, scholarly tone | Research papers, academic writing |
| `casual` | Informal, conversational tone | Blog posts, social media |
| `technical` | Precise, technical language | Documentation, specifications |
| `formal` | Professional, business tone | Reports, proposals |
| `creative` | Engaging, imaginative tone | Marketing, storytelling |

## Request Examples

**Basic Request:**
```json
{
  "text": "The future of AI is very promising.",
  "style": "technical"
}
```

**Advanced Request:**
```json
{
  "text": "Machine learning algorithms are becoming more sophisticated.",
  "style": "academic",
  "k": 5,
  "document_ids": ["ml_research_2024"],
  "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"]
}
```

## Response Format

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "original_text": "The future of AI is very promising.",
  "rephrasings": [
    {
      "text": "Artificial intelligence technologies demonstrate significant potential for advancement.",
      "confidence": 0.89,
      "style_match": 0.92
    },
    {
      "text": "AI development trajectories indicate substantial opportunities ahead.",
      "confidence": 0.85,
      "style_match": 0.88
    }
  ],
  "style": "technical",
  "sources": [
    {
      "id": "ai_development_potential_a1b2c3",
      "title": "AI Development Potential",
      "type": "Frame"
    }
  ],
  "search_time_ms": 140,
  "generation_time_ms": 2100
}
```

## Transformation Process

| Step | Description | Purpose |
|------|-------------|---------|
| **Context Analysis** | Understand original text meaning and context | Semantic understanding |
| **Knowledge Integration** | Find related concepts in knowledge graph | Contextual enhancement |
| **Style Application** | Apply requested style transformation | Tone adaptation |
| **Multiple Options** | Generate several rephrasing alternatives | Choice variety |
